name: Corpse Pockets
description: What's in the pockets of that dead body? Roll to find out what mundane, useful, or strange items they carried in life.

entries.result: A handful of lint and a single copper piece
A carved wooden holy symbol, faith unidentifiable
A letter from home, never opened
A small knife, blade dull from use
A crumpled wanted poster (not for them)
A lock of hair tied with a ribbon
A half-eaten piece of hardtack
A list of names with three crossed out
A worn deck of cards, missing the ace of spades
A small mirror, cracked
A promissory note for 50 gp from a local merchant
A child's drawing labeled 'daddy' or 'mommy'
A set of loaded dice
A ticket stub to a theater performance
A vial of perfume, nearly empty
A small journal with mundane daily entries
A key with no indication what it opens
A religious pamphlet warning of the end times
A love letter to someone other than their spouse
A worn coin from a distant land
A recipe for an incredible stew
A small bag of seeds (herbs or vegetables)
A membership token to a guild or club
A deed to property that may or may not exist
A crude map with an X marking somewhere nearby
A snuff box containing actual snuff
A pair of spectacles, one lens cracked
A rabbit's foot (didn't bring them luck)
A betting slip for a race that already happened
A small portrait of someone who looks like them
A flask of cheap whiskey, half full
A set of false teeth
A shopping list with embarrassing items
A pressed flower between two pieces of paper
A letter of recommendation, glowing but vague
A small pouch of exotic spice worth 5 gp
A pawn shop ticket for an item worth 10 gp
A code phrase written on a scrap of paper
A small book of terrible poetry they wrote
A lucky stone with a natural hole through it
A confession to a minor crime, unsigned
A small figurine of a loved one, crudely carved
An invitation to an event happening soon
A bill of sale for something they clearly stole
A tooth (not theirs) wrapped in cloth
A partially decoded cipher with notes
A sketch of the dungeon entrance with warnings
A letter revealing a scandalous secret about a noble
A contract with a dangerous organization, signed
A will leaving everything to whoever finds this body
Roll twice. Items are connected and tell a story.
